Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsable
System.Obsolete("This API supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.", true)

Docs.summary: A client receiver for multicast traffic from any source, also known as Any Source Multicast (ASM) or Internet Standard Multicast (ISM).

MemberSignature.Value: public UdpAnySourceMulticastClient (System.Net.IPAddress groupAddress, int localPort);

System.Obsolete("This API supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.", true)

Docs.param: The multicast group address for this receiver to subscribe to.
The local port for this receiver to bind to.
Docs.summary: Creates a new UDP client that can subscribe to a group address and receive datagrams from any source.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.%23ctor%2A>建構函式的 UDP 多點傳送的通訊端將與相關聯的群組位址和連接埠，但不會繫結或否則請使用通訊端。
`groupAddress`參數可能是由 IPv6 或 IPv4 多點傳送位址。
`localPort`參數必須指定低於 1024 的連接埠。

Docs.exception: is . reference
is less than 0 -or- is greater than 65,535.

Docs.param: A callback method to invoke when the operation completes.
Optional state information to pass to the callback method for this operation.
Docs.summary: Binds the socket and begins a join operation to the multicast group to allow datagrams to be received from any group participant.
Docs.returns: Returns . An that references this operation.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.BeginJoinGroup%2A>方法會將 UDP 多點傳送的通訊端繫結至本機連接埠，並聯結多點傳送的群組接收來自任一多點傳送的群組參與者的資料包。 中指定的本機連接埠和多點傳送的群組位址<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。
中指定的方法`callback`加入多點傳送的群組作業完成時，會叫用參數。
如果執行階段，需要<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.BeginJoinGroup%2A>方法也會執行原則檢查，確認 允許用戶端存取多點傳送的群組。 如果用戶端不允許存取<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>會擲回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError.AccessDenied>。

Docs.exception: The multicast group has already been joined or a join operation is currently in progress.
The has been disposed.
An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.

Docs.param: The buffer to store the received data.
The offset, in bytes, from the beginning of the buffer where the data should be stored.
The maximum number of bytes to receive and store in the buffer.
The callback method to invoke when the operation completes.
Optional state information to pass to the callback method for this operation.
Docs.summary: Begins the operation of receiving a packet from the joined multicast group and invokes the specified callback when a packet has arrived on the group from any sender.
Docs.returns: Returns . An that references this operation.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.BeginReceiveFromGroup%2A>方法開始從來自任何寄件者加入多點傳送群組接收 UDP 封包的作業。 中指定的本機連接埠和多點傳送的群組位址<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。 多點傳送的用戶端必須也已經完成聯結多點傳送群組。
中指定的方法`callback`已收到封包時，會叫用參數。
就可能發生通訊端失敗的狀況，如果接收作業失敗，以同步方式，雖然這是 UDP 與不常見。 如果發生通訊端失敗，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>就會擲回。 收到的錯誤指定的成員為<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError>列舉型別。

Docs.exception: is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
is less than 0 -or- is greater than the length of the . -or- is less than 0 -or- plus the count is greater than the length of the .
The multicast group has not yet been joined.
The has been disposed.
An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.

Docs.returns: Returns . An that references this operation.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.BeginSendTo%2A>方法開始將 UDP 封包傳送至聯結的多點傳送群組的作業。
用戶端必須先完成聯結多點傳送群組。 中指定的目的地位址`remoteEndPoint`參數必須已經傳送多點傳送封包給此收件者。 某些通訊協定會使用此資訊來傳遞流量控制，品質的服務統計資料或復原訊息。
中指定的方法`callback`已收到封包時，會叫用參數。
如果在指定的位址，將只允許傳輸`remoteEndPoint`參數已傳送多點傳送封包到此收件者。 如果用戶端不允許存取<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>會擲回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError.AccessDenied>。
如果在指定的目的地連接埠`remoteEndPoint`參數是小於 1,024<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>會擲回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError.AccessDenied>。
就可能發生通訊端失敗的狀況，如果接收作業失敗，以同步方式，雖然這是 UDP 與不常見。 如果發生通訊端失敗，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>就會擲回。 收到的錯誤指定的成員為<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError>列舉型別。

Docs.exception: is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
is less than 0 -or- is greater than the length of the . -or- is less than 0 -or- plus the count is greater than the length of the .
The multicast group has not yet been joined.
The has been disposed.
An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.

用戶端必須先完成聯結多點傳送群組。
中指定的方法`callback`已收到封包時，會叫用參數。
就可能發生通訊端失敗的狀況，如果接收作業失敗，以同步方式，雖然這是 UDP 與不常見。 如果發生通訊端失敗，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>就會擲回。 收到的錯誤指定的成員為<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError>列舉型別。

Docs.param: The address of the source to block.
Docs.summary: Blocks a source so that multicast packets originating from it are no longer received.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.BlockSource%2A>方法會封鎖來自指定的來源位址的收到的多點傳送封包。 用戶端必須先完成聯結多點傳送群組。
`sourceAddress`參數可能是由 IPv6 或 IPv4 位址，但`sourceAddress`參數必須符合用戶端加入多點傳送群組位址系列。
中指定的方法`callback`已收到封包時，會叫用參數。
如果在執行區塊的來源作業，通訊端失敗<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>就會擲回。 收到的錯誤指定的成員為<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError>列舉型別。

Docs.exception: The multicast group has not yet been joined.
The has been disposed.
An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.

Docs.summary: Leaves the multicast group and releases all resources used by the current instance of the class and the underlying the .

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.Dispose%2A> 使用完畢時，請呼叫 <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient>。 Dispose 方法會使<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient>中無法使用的狀態。 之後呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.Dispose%2A>，您必須釋放所有的參考<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient>讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient>所佔用。
在您釋放最後一個 <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.Dispose%2A> 參考之前，請務必呼叫 <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient>。 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient> 物件的 <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 方法。

Docs.param: The result of the asynchronous join operation.
Docs.summary: Completes the asynchronous join group operation to a multicast group.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.EndJoinGroup%2A>方法完成非同步的繫結至多點傳送群組的通訊端與聯結作業。
如果執行階段，需要<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.EndJoinGroup%2A>方法也會執行原則檢查，確認 允許用戶端存取多點傳送的群組。 如果用戶端不允許存取<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>會擲回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError.AccessDenied>。
如果在執行 加入群組作業中，通訊端失敗<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>就會擲回。 收到的錯誤指定的成員為<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError>列舉型別。

Docs.exception: is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
The has been disposed.
An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsable
System.Obsolete("This API supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.", true)

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether outgoing multicast packets are delivered to the sending application.
Docs.value: 傳回 。 值，指出是否傳送應用程式傳遞至多點傳送群組的傳出封包。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 多點傳送的流量是可擴充的方法，在網際網路上的多對多通訊。 處理程序訂閱的多點傳送的群組位址。 然後，每個訂閱的多點傳送位址的處理序都會收到所訂閱的程序傳送至多點傳送群組的任何封包。 <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.MulticastLoopback%2A>此用戶端屬性會控制任何在本機電腦上的處理是否接收多點傳送封包傳送至多點傳送群組。

Docs.exception: The multicast group has not yet been joined.
The has been disposed.

.property instance int32 ReceiveBufferSize
Public Property ReceiveBufferSize As Integer
public: property int ReceiveBufferSize { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.ReceiveBufferSize : int with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsable
System.Obsolete("This API supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.", true)

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the size, in bytes, of the receive buffer of the used for multicast receive operations on this instance.
Docs.value: 傳回 。 接收緩衝區的大小，以位元組為單位。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.ReceiveBufferSize%2A>屬性會取得或設定大小，以位元組為單位的接收緩衝區的基礎<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>用於多點傳送的接收作業，在此<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient>執行個體。 具體而言，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.ReceiveBufferSize%2A>屬性會控制封包到達，但尚未呼叫應用程式時，由堆疊所用的緩衝區大小<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.BeginReceiveFromGroup%2A>方法。 如果這個緩衝區填滿，而且封包一直出現在應用程式會呼叫之前<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.BeginReceiveFromGroup%2A>和<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.EndReceiveFromGroup%2A>方法，舊的封包會遭到捨棄。 應用程式永遠無法收到舊的封包，並呼叫時，則改為將會收到較新的封包<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.BeginReceiveFromGroup%2A>方法。
在 Windows 上的接收緩衝區的預設大小為 8192 個位元組。

Docs.exception: The buffer size specified is less than 0.
The multicast group has not yet been joined.
The has been disposed.

Docs.value: 傳回 。 傳送緩衝區大小，以位元組為單位。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.SendBufferSize%2A>屬性會取得或設定大小，以位元組為單位的基礎通訊端上的多點傳送的傳送作業所使用的傳送緩衝區<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient>執行個體。
呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.BeginSendToGroup%2A>或是<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.BeginSendTo%2A>方法會比較長，呼叫回呼的值而定<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.SendBufferSize%2A>屬性，如果傳送緩衝區已滿。 <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.SendBufferSize%2A>屬性唯一的控制項，使用者的緩衝區是否保持您的實體記憶體中鎖定，直到傳送完成。
在 Windows 上的傳送緩衝區的預設大小為 8192 個位元組。

Docs.exception: The buffer size specified is less than 0.
The multicast group has not yet been joined.
The has been disposed.

MemberSignature.Value: public void UnblockSource (System.Net.IPAddress sourceAddress);
.method public hidebysig instance void UnblockSource(class System.Net.IPAddress sourceAddress) cil managed
Public Sub UnblockSource (sourceAddress As IPAddress)
public: void UnblockSource(System::Net::IPAddress ^ sourceAddress);
member this.UnblockSource : System.Net.IPAddress -> unit

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsable
System.Obsolete("This API supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.", true)

Docs.param: The address of the source to unblock.
Docs.summary: Unblocks a source that was previously blocked by a call to the method so that multicast packets originating from it can be received.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.UnblockSource%2A>方法會解除封鎖來自指定的來源位址，因此可接收多點傳送封包。 指定的來源位址必須先前已封鎖的呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.BlockSource%2A>方法。
用戶端必須先完成聯結多點傳送群組。
`sourceAddress`參數可能是由 IPv6 或 IPv4 多點傳送位址。
如果指定的來源位址`sourceAddress`參數不先前被封鎖的呼叫所<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.BlockSource%2A>方法，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>會擲回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError.AddressNotAvailable>。
如果在執行解除封鎖來源作業，通訊端失敗<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>就會擲回。 收到的錯誤指定的成員為<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError>列舉型別。

Docs.exception: The multicast group has not yet been joined.
The has been disposed.
An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.
